Reviews.Title: Not all Samsung Galaxy Mega's are the same...
Reviews.Author: R.J.
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung Galaxy Mega and decided to upgrade a family member with this one.  I also ordered a case and accessories.  When the phone came, it looked a little different than mine.  I quickly realized the size was smaller.  It's not completely obvious the "5.8" in the name is the "size" of the device screen.  Apparently I have the 6.3 so this one is actually smaller than what I was expecting.  Again - not extremely obvious so thought I'd share that for anyone wanting a Samsung Galaxy Mega and expecting to get the large screen version.  Apart from that, the device is pretty similar to the 6.3 version but at the end-of-the day, it's really about screen size.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Dewitt
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Does almost everything you could ask a phone to do. Fast and has a long lasting battery. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: great phone good deal...
Reviews.Author: Rueta worthy
Reviews.Content: I love my new phone it was shipped fast...which is a plusNo problem so far had it a couple days now hope it stays that way!!!

Reviews.Title: I love this phone ... It works great better than the one before ... I can hear my incoming call alert while I'm talking
Reviews.Author: Naomi E.
Reviews.Content: Great phone ... No problem so far , I'll update more at a later date .. Thanks you very much

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: J.P Armstrong
Reviews.Content: I luv my phone... it a great product....... and function very well ...Thank you very much... I love it yeap

Reviews.Title: worst service ever
Reviews.Author: amanda vongphachanh
Reviews.Content: It's took me 2 weeks to get it. The service sucked. I didn't get the extra car charger. Waste of my time.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Alicia Yancy
Reviews.Content: I am so satisfied with my purchase! Now I'm just waiting on the case, so my phone can continue to look new.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Angelique
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone February 16 and received it February 25. I went to Walmart and got the $60 Starter kit from Straight Talk, followed ALL the instructions and I was set and ready to make and receive calls and texts and had no issues with my WiFi or Data connections.So far there is nothing about this phone I don't like, one of my favorite features is Multi Window mode and the different modes on the camera. The phone comes with a USB charger but it has a funky looking adapter so I just removed that and used one of my adapters with the cord. It also comes with some Samsung ear buds, but I doubt they will last long so I will only use them for emergency backup as I already have my own over the ear.

Reviews.Title: Great phone but was tricked.
Reviews.Author: Esmeralda Sanchez
Reviews.Content: The phone is great. But I was tricked it said in the discription that it came with a usb car charger and didnt recive it.
